deleteYourYarshaAccountDescription: Deleting your Yarsha account is permanent. You will lose access to your messages, contacts, bot data, chat and wallet and wallet history. This action cannot be undone.
profileContactsErased: Your profile and contacts will be erased
botConversationsErased: All bot conversations will be erased
walletHistoryErased: Your wallet history will be erased
areYourSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
toConfirmTypeDelete: To confirm, type "DELETE" in the box below
accountDeleted: Your Yarsha account has been deleted successfully
accountDeletedDescription: You can rejoin anytime with your phone number, but your old data will not be restored.
contactsPermissionRequiredMessage: Yarsha uses your contacts to help you invite friends, connect with people you know, and securely share your wallet address.
toShowContacts: To show your contacts and invite friends, Yarsha needs access to your contacts. Please allow Yarsha to access your contacts.
cameraAccessDeniedMessage: We need camera access to take a group photo.
cameraAccessBlockedMessage: Camera access is blocked. Please enable it in settings to take a photo.
